alert.note: Alert for Hartley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 28 at 9:35PM CDT until May 28 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OLDHAM...NORTHERN POTTER...SOUTHERN SHERMAN... SOUTHEASTERN DALLAM...MOORE AND EASTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 935 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Sunray to 12 miles west of Channing, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dumas, Dalhart, Hartley, Cactus, Fritch, Sunray, Channing, Four Way, Boys Ranch, Masterson and Lake Meredith. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
